panels.description: The rate of bytes processed by the component.
panels.title: Input events bytes rate (bytes/sec)

panels.description: The rate of bytes processed by the component.
panels.title: Transform events bytes rate (bytes/sec)

panels.description: A ratio from 0 to 1 of the load on a component. A value of 0 would indicate a completely idle component that is simply waiting for input. A value of 1 would indicate a that is never idle. This value is updated every 5 seconds.
panels.title: Transform utilization

panels.description: The rate of bytes processed by the component.
panels.title: Output events bytes rate (bytes/sec)

panels.description: A ratio from 0 to 1 of the load on a component. A value of 0 would indicate a completely idle component that is simply waiting for input. A value of 1 would indicate a that is never idle. This value is updated every 5 seconds.
panels.title: Output utilization

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode!="idle"}[2m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}[2m])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="system"}[2m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}[2m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job",  mode="user"}[2m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}[2m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job",  mode="iowait"}[2m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}[2m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job",  mode=~".*irq"}[2m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}[2m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job",  mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[2m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}[2m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job",  mode="idle"}[2m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}[2m])))

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
